featured.text: In ancient Greece, what did the priests do to show people they had unusual power?
This was done mainly to convince people that the priests were powerful.
They also talk to the priests and pray to the gods.
This explains why at that time the priests even built magic devices into their temples.

definition.zh_def: 神父；牧師，負責宗教儀式和教會事務的人。
definition.en_def: A priest is a person authorized to perform religious rituals and ceremonies, especially in the Christian faith.
definition.example: The priest delivered a heartfelt sermon during the Sunday service.
